title: Coming Out
body:
Coming Out

The door of the law formation room opened, and Evan walked out. After emerging, he left the building where the law formation room was located and waited outside.

"As expected, it's not that easy..." Evan muttered as he looked at his status window after leaving the building.

Name: Evan

Race: Eltharon

Rank: Mid Level Rank One Core Evolver

Bloodline: Doom Bringer (Partially Awakened)

Strength: 85

Agility: 100 (7 points will be added when the rank of your Core reaches the peak-level Rank One)

Endurance: 88

World Essence: 100 (20 points will be added when the rank of your Core reaches the peak-level Rank One)

Stamina: 92

Intelligence: 74

Primordial Shadow Energy: 80

---) Current Understanding Of The Conceptual Energy Of Void: 21.21%

In just a single month, Evan's understanding of Void Energy increased by more than 11 percent.
